attributes.action: Rebuild the beacon Cafe on the Malvern hills.
attributes.additional_details: The cafe had the best views of the Malverns and surrounding areas & was the only rest stop with facilities on the upper reaches of the hills on the beacon path, It used to be a gathering place once a year for the lighting of the beacons a tradition that has been lost in recent times, After the fire everyone expected the cafe to be rebuilt sadly this was not the case & part of Malverns history was lost, This something that needs to be restored not just for Malvernians but visitors to the area.
attributes.background: The beacon cafe A café that had existed on the summit of the Malvern Hills for many decades was destroyed by fire in 1989.
